newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila's PHIBOR rates softer across-the-board.
newsitem.headline: Manila's PHIBOR rates softer across-the-board.

text.p: The Philippine interbank offered rates (PHIBOR) were weaker in all maturities on Monday in line with the soft trend at the money market, traders said.
"This is a further correction," a foreign bank dealer said.
Banks widely expect T-bill rates to go down in the auction on Monday after the Central Bank cut its overnight borrowing rate to 10.0 percent last Friday from 10.25 percent.
Moreover, the Central Bank withdrew its three-month special series T-bills which signalled to the market that it wants the rate on these bills lower at the auction, traders said.
Average rates quoted by 20 banks were:
